00006 extern void my_exit(void);

00009 #include "w_list.h"
00010 
00011 enum win_buttons {
00012     wb_none = 0, wb_drag = 1, wb_size = 2, wb_close = 4, wb_shrink = 8
00013 };
00014 enum win_refresh {
00015     wr_normal, wr_routine
00016 };
00017 /* routine=normal refresh, use in shrink a special refresh rountine instead of
00018     saving the bitmap (used for plotwindow)
00019    normal=normal refresh, in shrink saving the contents of the window
00020     in a bitmap */
00021 enum but_types {
00022     w_b_press, w_b_drag, w_b_switch, w_b_choose, w_b_string,
00023     w_b_tag, w_b_list, w_b_number
00024 };
00025 enum keycode_flags {
00026     w_kf_exit = 1
00027 };
00028 
00029 struct w_keycode
00030 {
00031     int kbstat, key, event;
00032     enum keycode_flags flags;
00033 };
00034 
00035 /* the event definitions */
00036 struct w_event {
00037     int x, y;   /* coords of mouse relative to upper,left edge of window
00038                    freespace */
00039     struct ws_event *ws;
00040     struct w_window *w; /* window in which the click is. */
00041 };
00042 
00043 struct w_button {
00044     int no; /* is filled by add_button */
00045     enum but_types type;
00046     int xpos, ypos, xsize, ysize; /* size is not used by some buttons */
00047     struct w_window *w;
00048     const char *helptxt;
00049     struct list inscription, a_inscription;
00050     void *data; /* this pointer you can use to store a link to your data */
00051     struct ws_event event; /* the event that activated that button */
00052     union {
00053         struct w_b_press *p;
00054         struct w_b_drag *dr;
00055         struct w_b_switch *s;
00056         struct w_b_choose *ls;
00057         struct w_b_string *str;
00058         struct w_b_tag *tag;
00059         struct w_b_strlist *sls;
00060         struct w_bi_desc *de;
00061         void *d;
00062     } d;
00063 };
00064 
00065 struct w_description {
00066     int x, y; /* relative to upper,left edge */
00067     enum desc_types {
00068         w_bdt_txt, w_bdt_image
00069     } type;
00070     int image_with_bg;
00071     union {
00072         struct ws_bitmap *bm;
00073         char *txt;
00074     } contents;
00075 };
00076 
00077 struct w_b_press /* this is a normal click button */
00078 {
00079     /* l/r_pressed_routine are called when the button is pressed down after
00080        delay/100 seconds and each time if the buttons is still pressed down
00081        after at least repeat/100 seconds. If repeat==0 the routines are called
00082        immediately after the previous call returned, if repeat<0 the routines
00083        are called once. */
00084     int delay, repeat;
00085     void (*l_pressed_routine)(struct w_button *b);
00086     void (*r_pressed_routine)(struct w_button *b);
00087     void (*l_routine)(struct w_button *b);
00088     void (*r_routine)(struct w_button *b);
00089 };
00090 
00091 struct w_b_drag /* this is a drag button like the size button */
00092 {
00093     /* dx,dy are the coordinates relative to the upper,left edge of the
00094        button */
00095     void (*l_pressroutine)(struct w_button *b, int dx, int dy);
00096     void (*r_pressroutine)(struct w_button *b, int dx, int dy);
00097     void (*l_dragroutine)(struct w_button *b, int dx, int dy);
00098     void (*r_dragroutine)(struct w_button *b, int dx, int dy);
00099     void (*l_relroutine)(struct w_button *b, int dx, int dy);
00100     void (*r_relroutine)(struct w_button *b, int dx, int dy);
00101 };
00102 
00103 struct w_b_switch /* this is a switch -- when you click it, it stay there */
00104 {
00105     int on; /* 1 if clicked, 0 if not */
00106     void (*l_routine)(struct w_button *b);
00107     void (*r_routine)(struct w_button *b);
00108 };
00109 
00110 struct w_b_choose /* this is a button where you can choose you one item */
00111 {
00112     int d_xsize; /* size of button for inscription */
00113     int num_options; /* number of options */
00114     const char **options; /* Array of options */
00115     int selected; /* number of the option selected */
00116     void (*select_lroutine)(struct w_button *b);
00117     void (*select_rroutine)(struct w_button *b);
00118 };
00119 
00120 struct w_b_tag /* you can choose several items from a list */
00121 {
00122     int num_options, max_options;
00123     const char **options;
00124     int *tagged; /* 0 if option is not selected, 1 if selected */
00125     void (*tag_lroutine)(struct w_button *b); /* called when list is closed */
00126     void (*tag_rroutine)(struct w_button *b);
00127 };
00128 
00129 struct w_b_string /* button to enter a string */
00130 {
00131     int d_xsize; /* size of button for inscription */
00132     int max_length;
00133     int offset, length; /* offset and length are needed for scrolling,
00134                        they're set by the wins-routines. */
00135     char *str;
00136     int (*allowed_char)(int x);
00137     void (*l_char_entered)(struct w_button *b);
00138     void (*r_char_entered)(struct w_button *b);
00139     void (*l_string_entered)(struct w_button *b);
00140     void (*r_string_entered)(struct w_button *b);
00141 };
00142 
00143 struct w_b_strlist /* button like the button for a filelist */
00144 {
00145     int no_strings, start_no, no_rows, max_selected;
00146     char **strings, *sel_arr;
00147     void (*l_string_selected)(struct w_button *b);
00148     void (*r_string_selected)(struct w_button *b);
00149 };
00150 
00151 struct w_window {
00152     int no; /* is filled by open_window */
00153     int xpos, ypos, xsize, ysize; /* normal size */
00154     int maxxsize, maxysize; /* if this is <=0 there is no limit */
00155     int shrunk; /* only titlebar = 1, 0 otherwise */
00156     const char *title;
00157     char hotkey;
00158     const char *help;
00159     enum win_buttons buttons;
00160     enum win_refresh refresh;
00161     void *data; /* this is the parameter used in the routines. You can
00162                 use it to store a pointer to the contents of the window */
00163     void (*refresh_routine)(struct w_window *, void *);
00164     void (*close_routine)(struct w_window *, void *);
00165     void (*click_routine)(struct w_window *, void *, struct w_event *);
00166 };
